text:
Initial feedback on file field.

• Name is cut off even though there is lot of room in the column
• I would love the option to set a default folder for the file manager. Often, especially with HubDB, you end up using the same folder for something like a resources page. In my case, I'm working with the same file but with different version numbers, all within the same folder. Having the file manager open to a specific folder by default would be amazing.
